Summary PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE SUMMARY: 
 
Experienced Materials Project Manager with a proven track record exceeding revenue targets, inventory turns, and providing on-time delivery. Expert in material production systems and material requirements planning. Consistently develops strong business relationships both internally and externally with an emphasis on customer satisfaction and communication. Special emphasis on turning around troubled projects, accurate estimating/bidding on projects, and maintaining precise MRP for supply chain flow. Experience with international teams and transfers. 
 
Excels at managing scope, cost, schedule, and deliverables. Responsible for managing all project resources, including team members and subcontractors, and for establishing an effective communication plan with the project teams, senior staff, and customers. Provides day-to-day direction to the project team and regular project status updates to the customer. Specialties:budgeting, cd - rom, cisco, delivery, hewlett packard, ibm, inventory management, leadership, management, materials management, microsoft access, microsoft excel, microsoft word, mrp, packaging, printers, procurement, reports, retail, shipping, software development, supply chain, Summary PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE SUMMARY:
